sub_fields.label: Section Overlap
sub_fields.name: section_overlap
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, this section will get negative margins and overlap over the section above it.

choices.forward: Normal => Image on Left, Core Values on Right
choices.reverse: Reverse => Core Values on Left, Image on Right

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: If Images field has images, this video field will be overridden.

sub_fields.label: Single Heading
sub_fields.name: single_heading
sub_fields.instructions:
If single heading is provided, the core values section will be covered with this text instead of the core values. Core values will be skipped.

Use <br> for line breaks.

choices.forward: Normal => Image on Left, Links on Right
choices.reverse: Reverse => Links on Left, Image on Right
